comment:
* A class that describes the HDMI port hotplug event.
 *
 * @hide

methods.name: public int getPort()
methods.comment:
* Returns the port number for which the event occurred.
     *
     * @return port number

methods.name: public boolean isConnected()
methods.comment:
* Returns the connection status associated with this event
     *
     * @return true if the device gets connected; otherwise false

methods.name: public int describeContents()
methods.comment:
* Describes the kinds of special objects contained in this Parcelable's
     * marshalled representation.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)
methods.comment:
* Flattens this object in to a Parcel.
     *
     * @param dest The Parcel in which the object should be written.
     * @param flags Additional flags about how the object should be written.
     *        May be 0 or {@link Parcelable#PARCELABLE_WRITE_RETURN_VALUE}.

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)
